definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: The agreement still requires ratification from the full Senate and the Russian Duma.
sentences.chinese: 該協議仍然需要參議院全體議員和俄羅斯杜馬的批准。

sentences.english: In the wake of the scandal, the senator's one-time adherents quietly deserted him.
sentences.chinese: 因爲醜聞，該參議院昔日的追隨者悄然棄他而去。

sentences.english: He became a Congressman at the young age of 29 and brought his frontier swagger to the Senate a year later.
sentences.chinese: 他29歲成爲議員並在一年後昂首闊步進入參議院。

sentences.english: The Senate later passed the legislation.
sentences.chinese: 參議院後來通過了原來打算討論的立法。

sentences.english: But the previous day the Senate threw down the gauntlet to China.
sentences.chinese: 但是前一天，參議院對中國發起了挑戰。

sentences.english: The senate had a session today with closed doors.
sentences.chinese: 參議院今天召開一次祕密會議。

sentences.english: The Senate shall have the sole Power to try all Impeachments.
sentences.chinese: 唯參議院具有審判一切彈劾案之權。

sentences.english: The Senate adjourned for the summer.
They simply threatened to filibuster until the Senate adjourns.
sentences.chinese: 他們僅威脅說要發動抗爭直到參議院休會。

sentences.english: Climate bill - which would bring cuts of 4% from 1990 levels by 2020 - is bogged down in Senate
sentences.chinese: 本國氣候變化法案正在參議院審議中擱置。

sentences.english: Representation in the Senate is based on the principle of state equality.
sentences.chinese: 參議院的陳訴基於國家平等的原則。

sentences.english: And anti-American finger-pointing will only make it harder to extract the climate-change legislation from the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 粗暴的反美只會使參議院更加難以通過氣候變化法案。

sentences.english: Although the Senate is considered the upper house of the chambers has equal power.
sentences.chinese: 雖然參議院被認爲是上院，但實際上兩院是平級的。

sentences.english: The White House has also stepped up its efforts to shepherd the bill through the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 白宮也已經加緊努力，遊說在參議院通過該法案。

sentences.english: But then the Senate turned it down and adjourned.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這個法案被參議院否決了，隨後進入休會期。

sentences.english: If the House votes for impeachment, the case then goes to the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 彈劾案在衆議院通過後即轉交參議院審理。

definition: lower house of bicameral assembly/House of Representatives (USA)/Chamber of Deputies
